title: The Caged Man and the Witch
description: Without truth, love is a fantasy. Love, despite the truth, is divine. Henry, a handsome nobody, wakes up imprisoned in a cage hanging in the medieval kingdom of Ironhorn, at the mercy of two very different Brigit, an enchantingly beautiful witch, needs Henry to love her, but stealing his heart is more complicated than either could have anticipated.King Sievers, the pompous, tyrannical ruler of Ironhorn, is determined to conquer all beastsâ€”men and witches alike. Strange and magical events lead to a battle none could have imagined, and none may survive.The Caged Man and the A Novella, is a Medieval Romantic Fantasy, an emotional journey with a sprinkling of humor.Story Content Mild Language, Moderate Violence, Clean Romance (no descriptive sex)
author: E.J. Stillings
